item.description:
Join NHCer Josh at a Professional Networking Happy Hour.

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Kelly’s Restaurant and Bar in New Haven on Thursday, May 24, 2012.

The event is from 5:30 – 8:00. This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Specials: Kelly’s will be providing drink specials and free appetizers to all attendees.

Don't Forget your Business Cards!

For Happy Hour type Events, please note in your RSVP section if you are only a "Maybe".
item.how_to_find_us: If you need help, look for or contact Josh at 203-772-0070 .
item.name: Young Professionals Networking Happy Hour
